column4: hey if I install ubuntu minimal, will I have a problem getting the ath5k wireless? and will it be simpley apt-get install nm nm-applet??
I like ubuntu working out-the-box, i'd just like to minimal" it all (with flux, etc) >>oh crap I better not then
it will be enough but u will be stuck at cli only
I could do the 4-5 iwconfig commands, I think I can handle that"
i m using ubuntu minimal, with nm-applet, i have also tried with wicd, me using fluxbox
I could even just plug it in and then apt-get the nm-applet
oh? how'd you go with the drivers there?
do you like wicd better? (I noticed it's only 39 k)
both are fine with me, i had initially updaeted with wired connection
my system after bootup takes only 35 mb of ram and it hardly goes above 130mb during my work
nicenice, fluxbox is looking pretty cool these days with the transparency and (i found the!!) wbar/idesk
I'm on puppy -> 10.04 turned into abitova hog 4me
ahh puppy i got that one on my sd card for emergnecy purpose, bit i still uses that a lot
